snippet: Sight-reading music is an essential skill for students of any instrument. Several apps offer confidence-building and entertaining exercises.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column highlights apps for students learning to sight-read music.
lead_paragraph: Sight-reading music is an essential skill for students of any instrument. Several apps offer confidence-building and entertaining exercises.

headline.print_headline: High-Tech Tutors That Build Confidence in Reading Music
headline.main: Video Feature: Pitch-Perfect Ways to Read Music Better
